duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare development and construction budgets for prospective developments
Compile project draw requests to include AIA pay applications and consultant invoices to submit to financial partners
Communicate regularly with construction team and provide them financial & accounting support for the project
Verify that transactions comply with financial policies and procedures
Post and review approved invoices for payment
Maintain project-related records, including contracts and change orders
Verbal and written communication with employees, vendors, owners, etc.
